alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:12PM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
